title: Olay Regenerist Regenerating Lotion With Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 2.5 Fl Oz
description: If you spend any time outdoors, you need a daily moisturizer with sunscreen to help protect your skin from the sun's damaging rays, and help it look more energized. That's why the skincare experts at Olay developed Regenerist Regenerating Lotion with Sunscreen. This advanced lotion features Skin Energizing Technology, which includes an amino-peptide + B3 complex with vitamin C and Olay moisturizers. The lightweight formula helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by aiding surface cell turnover. This non-greasy and fast absorbing cream helps protect your skin from sun exposure with broad spectrum SPF 15 sunscreen and wont clog your pores. Just apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure, and reapply every 2 hours if you remain outdoors. Make Regenerist Regenerating Lotion with Sunscreen a regular part of your daily skincare regimen and reveal younger, healthier and more energetic-looking skin.

title: Johnson's Baby Shampoo, Travel Size, 1.5 Ounce (Pack of 48)
description: Johnson's knows bath time is a special time to share with your baby, and when the two of you are bonding, there's no room for tears. Our classic NO MORE TEARS formula rinses quickly and easily, leaves hair smelling fresh, and looking beautifully healthy and shiny it is soap free, hypoallergenic, and dermatologist tested.

title: Dove Men and Care Body and Face Wash, Clean Comfort, 18 Ounce (Pack of 3)
Dove Body Wash with NutriumMoisture, Deep Moisture, 24 Ounce Bottles (Pack of 4)
JOHN FRIEDA Luxurious Volume Extra Hold Hairspray, 10 Ounce
description: A quick drying anhydrous system that acts quickly to lock in body and volume without drying out the hair. Humidity-resistant to keep styles from flattening out. Contains just enough silicone to combat over-drying the hair.

title: Pantene Pro-V Curly Hair Series Moisture Renewal Conditioner With Pump 33.8 Fl Oz
AmLactin Ultra Triple Action Alpha Hydroxy Acid Hydrating Body Cream 4.9 oz.
description: AmLactin Ultra Triple Action Alpha Hydroxy Acid Hydrating Body Cream provides long lasting moisture while visibly improving the condition of dry, cracked or flaking skin. Ultraplex lactic acid complex retextures the skin's surface by boosting new cell growth and removing dead skin. Rich emollients and humectants ensure skin is soft and supple.
